TopicTitle: Couldn't find celestial body with name ''.

Articles.Content:
Hi, I've been getting this popping up a lot (thousands of entries, making the log file 20meg+ pretty fast).

Couldn't find celestial body with name ''.

If I play for a long time it causes the game to grind to a halt. When I disable the log I don't have an issue.

Not sure what mod is causing it? Assuming it may be outer planet/Kopernicus

Mods https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26687/Mods.txt

Output https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26687/Output_log%2025-08.txt

Any Ideas?

Thanks

Edit: Heh log file was 280meg after this last session. This line is in the log 25,575 times

Edited August 26, 2015 by Torih

I am getting same thing.

I am also using Kopernicus and OPM.

Will try removing and see if problem still is there.
I've removed both and still getting the log spam. No idea what to try now.
